TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit SystemFonts extends System.Object
public ref class SystemFonts abstract sealed

summary.span: 包含屬性，這些屬性會公開與字型有關的系統資源。

span.span: Contains properties that expose the system resources that concern fonts.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property CaptionFontFamily As FontFamily
public: static property System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ CaptionFontFamily { System::Windows::Media::FontFamily ^ get(); };

summary.span: 取得度量資訊，此度量資訊會決定非最小化視窗中非工作區的標題字型系列。

span.span: Gets the metric that determines the font family of the caption of the nonclient area of a nonminimized window.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 取得從 SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS 的度量。Obtain the metric from SPI_GETNONCLIENTMETRICS. 請參閱[SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp)。See [SystemParametersInfo](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/default.asp?url=/library/sysinfo/base/systemparametersinfo.asp). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage <*object property*="{ SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily`}`"/><*object property*="{ SystemFonts.CaptionFontFamily`}`"/>
